skills.name: Cosmic Amplifiers
skills.description:
Fires a laser beam that continuously deals DMG along a straight line of fire. Continuous firing will overheat the weapon. Closer enemies will take more DMG (maxes at 10-meter range or less).
[SP: 11][CD: 20s] When unleashed, all Sparkling Stars on the battlefield will sparkle brightly, dealing 200% ATK of Physical DMG (per star) to nearby enemies and impairs them, reducing their DEF by 30% for 4.0s.
[Concert Stage] When picking up a Sparkling Star, all characters gain 10% Attack Speed for 5s (cannot stack).

skills.name: Sparkling Star
skills.description: When the character is deployed, 1 Sparkling Star appears nearby every 3s. Sparkling Star lasts 4.5s. When picking up the Sparkling Star, deal 200% ATK of Physical DMG to a random, nearby target and enemies surrounding it.
